Nick's Blog

Whew, I'm glad that is over.

16 November 2005

The latest news, or just late news, is that the UN will not be destroying the internet as previously threatened. Apparently there was a very productive meeting on the subject and it went very well for all parties. Here are the minutes of the meeting:

World: We want to control the internet.
USA: No.
World: Come on!
USA: No.
World: Will you at least think about it?
USA: No.
World: If you don't we will be forced to make our own DNS systems.
USA: OK.
World: But that will break the internet.
USA: OK
World: But that would be bad.
USA: Then leave it alone.
World: OK. But we're making a committee.
USA: That's cute.

Thanks ellem.
